answers.answer: There are many things that could be causing this. You should get her in and get a complete check up with blood work done. Have them check her blood pressure (sometimes low blood pressure can cause this), check for anemia, check her thyroid (a low thyroid can cause slow circulation), some blood diseases can cause this. Also have them check her blood sugar for diabetes. Sometimes diabetes can cause circulation problems as well as some heart diseases. With her age, though, I wouldn't think heart disease would be my first concern. That's where I'd start first and go from there. Best wishes.

question: My 16 year old daughter has purple feet and hands, they do not feel cold but she said they itch? She has suffered with this for such a long time is it anything to worry about?
title: poor circulation in feet and hands
